summary: App deployment had an error; user wants to replace the 4 sample images in Explore Our Work → Product Banner (Sample 1–4) with new images in sequence, delete old images, and start a new build/deploy.
known_issues: Deployment error caused the draft app to not show/update

existing_features.title: Replace the existing four static fallback Product Banner sample images used by the sample selector (paths referenced by `useSampleSlots()` in `frontend/src/hooks/useProductBannerSamples.ts`) with the user-uploaded images, in sequence, so that Explore Our Work → Product Banner → Sample 1–4 shows the new images even when the backend has no stored samples.
Rebuild and redeploy the app after the image replacement, and fix any build/deploy errors that prevent the draft app from updating.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace Explore Our Work → Product Banner Sample 1–4 images with new images in sequence and delete old sample images; then rebuild/deploy

projectName: Replace Product Banner Sample 1–4 images in Explore Our Work and rebuild/deploy
